## Auditor.withAuditScope() method

Add a high-level scope name for logged events. It helps to identify the root cause of low-level events.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
withAuditScope(name: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
